kimononet.geo

Class RandomWaypointGeoDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • kimononet.geo.RandomWaypointGeoDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeoDevice

    public class RandomWaypointGeoDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements GeoDevice
    GPS enabled device emulator that provided an initial location and velocity, acts according to the the Random Waypoint Model . Accordingly, each time getVelocity() is called, the bearing of the velocity will shift according to probability specified by turnInterval by maximum of maxTurn either in clockwise or counterclockwise direction.
    Since:
    3/14/2012
    Version:
    3/14/2012
    Author:
    Zorayr Khalapyan

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomWaypointGeoDevice(GeoLocation currentLocation, GeoVelocity velocity)
      Creates a new random waypoint model using DEFAULT_MAX_TURN and DEFAULT_TURN_INTERVAL.
      RandomWaypointGeoDevice(GeoLocation currentLocation, GeoVelocity velocity, GeoMap map)
      Creates a new random waypoint model using DEFAULT_MAX_TURN and DEFAULT_TURN_INTERVAL.
      RandomWaypointGeoDevice(GeoLocation currentLocation, GeoVelocity velocity, TimeProvider timeProvider, double maxTurn, double turnInterval)
      Creates a new GPS enabled device emulator based on the Random Waypoint Model .

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GeoLocation getLocation()
      Retrieves the current velocity using the method getVelocity() and updates the current location according to elapsed time.
      GeoVelocity getVelocity()
      With probability specified by turnInterval, updates the bearing direction by up to maxTurn and returns the current velocity.
      void setTimeProvider(TimeProvider timeProvider)
      Sets the current time provider.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomWaypointGeoDevice

        public RandomWaypointGeoDevice(GeoLocation currentLocation,
                       GeoVelocity velocity)
        Creates a new random waypoint model using DEFAULT_MAX_TURN and DEFAULT_TURN_INTERVAL. By default, the time provider will be set to the SystemTimeProvider.
        Parameters:
        currentLocation - The starting location.
        velocity - The starting velocity.

      • RandomWaypointGeoDevice

        public RandomWaypointGeoDevice(GeoLocation currentLocation,
                       GeoVelocity velocity,
                       GeoMap map)
        Creates a new random waypoint model using DEFAULT_MAX_TURN and DEFAULT_TURN_INTERVAL. By default, the time provider will be set to the SystemTimeProvider. The third parameter also specifies the bounding map.
        Parameters:
        currentLocation - The starting location.
        velocity - The starting velocity.
        map - The bounding map.

      • RandomWaypointGeoDevice

        public RandomWaypointGeoDevice(GeoLocation currentLocation,
                       GeoVelocity velocity,
                       TimeProvider timeProvider,
                       double maxTurn,
                       double turnInterval)
        Creates a new GPS enabled device emulator based on the Random Waypoint Model .
        Parameters:
        currentLocation - The starting location.
        velocity - The starting velocity.
        timeProvider - Time provider for this device. Might either be system time or a specific test-oriented time provider.
        maxTurn - Maximum allowed turn at each hop.

        public GeoVelocity getVelocity()
        With probability specified by turnInterval, updates the bearing direction by up to maxTurn and returns the current velocity.
